title: Introduction to Programming
description: Get started with programming using Python and basic concepts.

title: Frontend Web Development
description: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build responsive websites.

title: Backend Development with Node.js
description: Build server-side applications using Node.js and Express.

title: Databases and SQL
description: Learn how to model databases and use SQL for data operations.

title: RESTful APIs Design
description: Design and build RESTful APIs for modern web applications.

title: Git and Version Control
description: Master Git for code collaboration and version management.

title: Object-Oriented Programming
description: Understand OOP concepts and how to apply them in software design.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Improve problem-solving skills through key data structures and algorithms.

title: DevOps Fundamentals
description: Introduction to CI/CD, Docker, and infrastructure as code.

title: Agile Project Management
description: Learn how Agile and Scrum work in real-world software projects.

title: Cloud Computing Basics
description: Understand the fundamentals of cloud computing using AWS and GCP.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Learn basic cybersecurity principles and best practices.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Build mobile apps using Flutter and React Native.

title: Software Testing
description: Understand unit testing, integration testing, and test automation.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Discover ML concepts and tools to build intelligent systems.
